data.meta_site_name: The Emmys - The National Academy of Television Arts & Sciences
data.text:
Contributor Plaque or Certificate:

If you have received a plaque or certificate that includes the words:

"For contributions to the Emmy® award winning achievement"

this is known as a Contributor plaque / certificate. It is given to individuals who contribute toward an Emmy win, but not in a statue-eligible capacity.

Contributor plaques and certificates can not be upgraded toward statuettes.

Replacing Statuettes

Over time, the Emmy® statuette may become broken or damaged. Broken statuette cannot be repaired because of the way they are made and the materials used; they cannot be welded. Because of the intricacy of the design and skilled work required to make an Emmy®

statuette, it is more cost-effective to replace rather than attempt to refurbish it.

National Emmy® Awards: awards@emmyonline.tv

Children's & Family, Daytime, News & Documentary, Public & Community Service (discontinued), Sports and Technology & Engineering

Please specify the competition, year, category and program in your email.

Regional Emmy® Awards: Please contact your Regional Chapter for regional Emmy® inquiries

Primetime Emmy® Awards: awards@televisionacademy.com
